This is an example of R code.
```{r R code example}
# this is R code
summary(mtcars)
```


This is how to include figures
```{r Include figures}
library(ggplot2)
data("mtcars")
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point()
```
